title: Team Template + Object Initialization Rule (OIR)
summary: Define roles for workflow-driven objects in a team template and bind via OIR with a lifecycle.

steps.label: Create a Team Template
steps.action: New Team Template; add only roles required by your workflow; avoid pre‑assigning named users here.
steps.verify: Template saved with intended roles only.

steps.label: Create an OIR for the target type
steps.action: New OIR; select object type (e.g., a specific Document subtype); associate lifecycle template and the team template.
steps.verify: New objects of that type show the expected lifecycle and team template on the info page.
